text: Mittagong Lions Rugby League Football Club is an Australian rugby league football club based in Mittagong, New South Wales. Originally a rugby union club in the late 19th century, Mittagong was a founding member of the Berrima District Rugby League in 1914, just prior to the outbreak of the First World War. == Notable Juniors == *Daniel Alvaro (2015- Parramatta Eels) == References == ==External links== *Mittagong Lions RLFC Fox Sports pulse Category:Rugby league teams in Sydney Category:Rugby clubs established in 1914 Category:1914 establishments in Australia Category:Mittagong, New South Wales
title: Mittagong Lions
